column4: I get an error message when I follow the "restricted formats" help. E: Couldn't find package gstreamer0.10-pitfdll. Any ideas?
thanks. somehow I end up installing a bunch of kde apps in my ubuntu. is this a sign I should run kubuntu instead?
imo - only 2 kde apps worth having k3b & amarok
and they run fine under gnome
ok. I like krusader too actually. only thing I miss from windows is total commander
at work, all I need to get thru the day is emacs and total commander :-D
I can't believe sdc & sdb keep swapping around - is this ide or sata?
yep. I'll receive a MB pro one of the following days, and it seemed the best fs to use from both Ubuntu and OSX
can you set a disk label in hfs+ ? that would be best maybe
mkfs.hfsplus -v volume_name              -hopefully this will work same as ext3, which mounts your usb as /media/volume_name
sounds like a plan. but... that will recreate the fs as well as set volume_name, won't it? I have lots of data on the drive, so I need to just set the label. I'll google a bit :-)
